content: How can I create a JavaScript program to fetch the current temperature and other weather data from an online weather service and display it on a web page?

To create a JavaScript program that fetches the current temperature and other weather data from an online weather service and displays it on a web page, you'll need to use an API provided by a weather service. A popular choice is the OpenWeatherMap API.
